data.name: aboutLine1
data.value: JumpCraft was developed by Andrew First.

data.name: aboutLine2
data.value: Some image and sound files included with JumpCraft were not created by First Productions, Inc. Please browse in the directories containing these files to view their credits.

data.name: aboutLine3
data.value: Panel docking system created by Tim Dawson.

data.name: boundaries_AnimatedTileErrorMessage
data.value: Animated tiles cannot have different boundaries for each frame.

data.name: compileError_LineColumnHeader
data.comment: Line number of code that the error was on

data.name: compileError_MessageColumnHeader
data.comment: The error message

data.name: compileError_Subheading
data.value: One or more error(s) have occured when trying to compile your script:

data.name: editHelpText_Title
data.comment: This is the title for the dialog that allows the user to edit the help text for their game

data.name: featureDisabled_Message
data.value: The requested feature is locked in this edition of JumpCraft.

data.name: featureDisabled_Title
data.comment: Feature Unavailable

data.name: imageFileFilter
data.value: All Images|*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif;*.png|Bitmap Images|*.bmp|GIF Images|*.gif|JPG Images|*.jpg|PNG Images|*.png

data.name: nameFormatErrorMessage
data.value: Names may only contain letters, numbers, and underscores, and may not start with a number.

data.name: nameInUseErrorMessage
data.value: Name is being used by another control.

data.name: nameIsReservedWordErrorMessage
data.value: Name cannot be a reserved word.

data.name: windowAlreadyExistsMessage
data.value: A window already exists with the specified name.

data.name: pathCopyPointMenu
data.comment: Command to copy a point in a geometric path

data.name: pathDeletePointMenu
data.comment: Command to delete a point in a geometric path

data.name: untitledGameFilename
data.comment: Default filename for untitled game

data.name: main_64BitError
data.value: Currently we don't support Windows 64 bit edition. We are planning to add support in the future though, so please check back later.

data.name: main_OptionsError
data.value: An error occured while loading the options file.

data.name: main_LevelEditorError
data.value: An error occured while showing the Level Editor.

data.name: main_StartingStatus
data.comment: Shown in the status bar at the bottom of the main window

data.name: main_FatalError
data.value:
JumpCraft will now terminate.
We apologize for any inconveniences.

To report this error, email us at jumpcraft@firstproductions.com or visit our forums.

data.name: main_SaveChangesBeforeClosingMessage
data.value: Save changes to the current game before closing?
data.comment: Shown when JumpCraft is closing

data.name: main_SaveChangesBeforeClosingFileMessage
data.value: Save changes to the current game before closing it?
data.comment: Shown when a new game is opened

data.name: main_SaveChangesToPathMessage
data.value: Save changes to current path first?
data.comment: Shown when the Path Editor is open and the user requests to run the game

data.name: gameProperties_CollisionCheck
data.value: Do not perform pixel-level collision checks

data.name: gameProperties_ResolutionFrame
data.comment: used to set the screen resolution

data.name: gameProperties_WindowedOption
data.comment: used to specify windowed mode instead of fullscreen mode

data.name: gameProperties_CollisionHelpText
data.value: JumpCraft will only detect collision at a tile-level, meaning that irregularly-shaped tiles will be treated the same as rectangular-shaped tiles.

data.name: gameProperties_CollisionNoPixelPerfectOption
data.value: Do not perform pixel-level collision checks

data.name: gameProperties_CollisionHelpNoPixelPerfectDescription
data.value: Therefore, enabling this option will result in higher performance, but less accuracy.

data.name: gameProperties_CollisionHelpPixelPerfectDescription
data.value: JumpCraft will detect collision at a pixel level, producing much better accuracy, but at a slower speed.

data.name: newGameWizard_NewBlankGameCheck
data.comment: Checking this box will skip the wizard and create a new blank game.

data.name: newGameWizard_InstructionText
data.value: Click Next to continue, or Cancel to exit the wizard.

data.name: newGameWizard_WizardInfo
data.value: This wizard will guide you through the process of creating a new game. You will specify basic options and select presets for your game, and then JumpCraft will create a game for you that you can edit after.

data.name: newGameWizard_WelcomeText
data.value: Welcome to the JumpCraft New Game Wizard

data.name: newGameWizard_GameInformationSubheading
data.value: Please specify some basic information about your game

data.name: newGameWizard_GameInformationNote
data.value: (Note: You can edit this information later by clicking File -> Game Properties in the main editor)

data.name: newGameWizard_FinishText
data.value: To close this wizard and generate the new game, click Finish.

data.name: newGameWizard_FinishedText
data.value: You have successfully completed the JumpCraft New Game Wizard.

data.name: tilesUnit
data.comment: displayed when asking for a value as a unit of tiles (e.g. 5 tiles)

data.name: newGameWizard_HelpWindowOption
data.comment: option to create a help window in the new game

data.name: newGameWizard_AboutWindowOption
data.comment: option to create an about window in the new game

data.name: helpFileFilter
data.value: All Help and Text Files (*.hlp, *.chm, *.htm, *.html, *.rtf, *.txt, *.doc)|*.hlp;*.chm;*.htm;*.html;*.rtf;*.txt;*.doc|Help Files (*.hlp, *.chm)|*.hlp;*.chm|HTML Files (*.htm, *.html)|*.htm;*.html|Text Files (*.txt, *.rtf, *.doc)|*.txt;*.rtf;*.doc|All Files|*.*

data.name: newGameWizard_HelpAboutHeading
data.comment: behavior of the Help and About sections of the game

data.name: newGameWizard_UISubheading
data.value: Choose and customize your game's user interface style

data.name: newGameWizard_HelpAboutSubheading
data.value: Choose the behavior for the "Help" and "About" buttons.

data.name: windowSchemeWizard_Welcome
data.value: Welcome to the JumpCraft Window Scheme Wizard

data.name: windowSchemeWizard_Description
data.value: This wizard will guide you through the process of choosing and customizing a new window scheme. You will specify basic options and select presets for your window scheme, and then JumpCraft will create a new window layout and scheme for you that you can edit after. Any current window data will be lost in the process.

data.name: windowSchemeWizard_Finished
data.value: You have successfully completed the JumpCraft Window Scheme Wizard.

data.name: windowSchemeWizard_Finish
data.value: To close this wizard and generate the new window scheme, click Finish.

data.name: options_RecentGamesLabel
data.value: Number of recent games to display:

data.name: options_WarnDeleteActionsCheckbox
data.value: Warn me when my changes will delete existing actions

data.name: options_OpenDefaultGameCheckbox
data.value: When creating a new game, open the default game file

data.name: options_ShowGuidePointsCheckbox
data.comment: show the path guidepoints in the path editor

data.name: options_ShowPointsCheckbox
data.comment: show the path points in the path editor

data.name: pixelsUnit
data.comment: displayed when asking for a value as a unit of pixels (e.g. 5 px)

data.name: updates_RememberAccountCheckbox
data.value: Remember username and password on this computer

data.name: updates_NoUpdatesMessage
data.value: No updates are available at this time.

data.name: updates_PleaseWaitMessage
data.value: Please wait while JumpCraft checks for updates...

data.name: updates_ShowDescriptionLink
data.comment: click the link to show the description of the update

data.name: updates_InvalidUsernameOrPasswordErrorMessage
data.value: Invalid username or password. Please use the username and password that were supplied to you in your "Payment Received" email.

data.name: updates_UnableToConnectErrorMessage
data.value: Unable to connect to the server. Would you like to connect to the internet or confirm your internet connection?

data.name: updates_InvalidFileError
data.value: Invalid file. Please contact us so we can fix this problem.

data.name: updates_UnableToConnectErrorMessage2
data.value: Unable to connect to the server. Please make sure you are connected to the internet.

data.name: updates_AutoUpdateMessage
data.value: Would you like to enable Automatic Updates, which run every time you start up JumpCraft?

data.name: updates_AutoUpdateRefusedMessage
data.value: You can enable this option later by clicking Help > Check for Updates or Tools > Options.

data.name: welcome_HideAtStartupMessage
data.value: You can show this window again by clicking Tools > Options. In the General tab, check "Show welcome screen at startup."

data.name: windowTransition_AdvanceAfterLabel
data.comment: amount of time to advance the window (e.g. advance after 5 seconds)

data.name: editValue_FrameLabel
data.comment: label for selecting a frame of a tile

data.name: mixedFileFilter
data.value: All Files|*.*|Programs|*.exe|HTML Files|*.htm;*.html|Text Files|*.doc;*.rtf;*.txt|Image Files|*.bmp;*.gif;*.jpg;*.png|Sound Files|*.wav|Music Files|*.mp3;*.wma;*.mid|Movie Files|*.avi;*.wmv;*.mpg

data.name: deleteActionConfirmationMessage
data.value: This will result in the loss of one or more action(s). Continue anyway?

data.name: tileset_OpenIconTooltip
data.value: Delete current tileset and open a saved one

data.name: tileset_LoadImageErrorMessage
data.value: An error occured when loading the tile, "{0}".\n\nThis error might have occured because the tile was too large, was an animated GIF, or did not contain an image.

data.name: tileset_DeleteWarningMessage
data.value: Deleting this tile will result in the loss of {0} tiles throughout your levels. Proceed?

data.name: tileset_DeleteActionsWarningMessage
data.value: Deleting this tile will result in the loss of one or more action(s). Continue anyway?

data.name: tileset_DeleteAllConfirmationMessage
data.value: Delete all tiles from tileset? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: tileset_ImportWarningMessage
data.value: DANGER! This action will clear out all tiles from the levels in your game that refer to a missing tile (if the imported tileset has less tiles than the current tileset). This action cannot be undone.\n\nAre you sure you want to proceed?

data.name: tileset_ImportActionsMessage
data.value: Would you like to replace all actions with the saved actions?

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_NormalValue
data.comment: specifies the default behavior for the current behavior category

data.name: gameObjects_Heart
data.comment: item to increase health by one unit

data.name: gameObjects_Disintegrate
data.comment: a tile that disappears/disintegrates when stepped on

data.name: gameObjects_Exit
data.comment: the end of the level

data.name: gameObjects_SpikeDown
data.comment: a spike hurting a character moving downwards onto it

data.name: gameObjects_Spring
data.comment: a trampoline type object, makes the character shoot upwards when jumping on top of it

data.name: gameObjects_Unstable
data.comment: a tile that falls to the ground when stepped upon

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_CoinsToGetExtraLifeLabel
data.comment: number of coins to collect to receive an extra life

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_IncreaseHealthByAmountLabel
data.comment: amount to increase character's health by when collecting a certain object

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_MaxHealthLabel
data.comment: the maximum health a character can have

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_IncreaseLivesByLabel
data.comment: number of extra lives to receive when collecting this item

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_SlipSpeedLabel
data.comment: speed for character to slip when on top of ice

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_DecreaseHealthByLabel
data.comment: amount to decrease player's health by

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_DecreaseScoreLabel
data.comment: amount to decrease player's score by

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_JumpHeightLabel
data.comment: how high to jump

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_JumpTime
data.comment: how long does it take to jump

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_FallAfter
data.comment: amount of time after the player lands on the unstable tile until it falls to the ground

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_DropScaleSpeed
data.comment: a speed scale factor at which an unstable tile falls

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_DisintegrateAfter
data.comment: time after landing on a disintegratable tile until it disappears

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_SoundOnKill
data.comment: sound to play when an enemy is killed

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_KillBonusLabel
data.comment: amount to increase score by when enemy is killed

data.name: tileBehaviorEd_JumpHeightOnKillLabel
data.comment: amount of make the character jump when it kills an enemy

data.value: All Text Files|*.txt;*.vb|Plain Text Files|*.txt|VB.NET Source Files|*.vb|All Files|*.*

data.name: scriptEd_MustFixErrorsMessage
data.value: You cannot continue until you fix the errors in {0}.

data.name: resizeLevelDialog_ActionWarningLabel
data.value: Warning: Actions that use coordinates may need to be updated.

data.name: resizeLevelDialog_LevelTooBigErrorMessage
data.value: Map size is too big. There may only be 250,000 map cells per level.

data.value: No tiles matching your search terms were found.

data.value: {0} tiles were found matching your search terms.

data.value: All tiles matching your search terms have been found. Continue searching at the beginning?

data.value: {0} tiles matching your search results were replaced.

data.name: actionDataEd_SetDefaultConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to set the current action data as the default?

data.name: trigger_Numpad
data.comment: indicates a number pad key

data.name: actionEd_NoActionTypesExist
data.value: No action types exist! Create new action types using the Action Data Editor, or if you just deleted all the action types by mistake, click Cancel after you close this message.

data.name: actionEd_CodeBlockWarning
data.value: Warning: A code block has not been closed.

data.name: actionEd_CodeBlockNotOpenWarning
data.value: Warning: A code block has not been opened.

data.name: standardEd_Thanks
data.value: Thanks for purchasing JumpCraft Standard Edtiion! You may use this program to develop and share games with your friends.

data.name: standardEd_UpgradeLaterInfo
data.value: Note: You can always upgrade later by clicking Upgrade in the Help menu.

data.name: proEd_NoNameErrorMessage
data.value: You must name your game before compiling.

data.name: proEd_VersionErrorMessage
data.value: You must give your game a version number before compiling.

data.name: demoEd_Thanks
data.value: Thanks for trying out JumpCraft! Let us know what you think...

data.name: demoEd_UnableToShowSurveyLabel
data.value: We are unable to show the survey here at this time.

data.name: demoEd_Intro
data.value: You are about to use a program that will let you unleash your creative potential and dabble into an art that few people get the opportunity to do.

data.name: fpsUnit
data.comment: frames per second

data.value: Enter a new name for this level.

data.value: Use a random subtile from the selected subtiles.
